mapper.sql: gistic.GISTIC_ROI_ID AS "gisticRoiId", cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_IDENTIFIER AS "cancerStudyId", gistic.CHROMOSOME AS "chromosome", gistic.CYTOBAND AS "cytoband", gistic.WIDE_PEAK_START AS "widePeakStart", gistic.WIDE_PEAK_END AS "widePeakEnd", gistic.Q_VALUE AS "qValue", gistic.AMP AS "amp"
FROM gistic INNER JOIN cancer_study ON gistic.CANCER_STUDY_ID = cancer_study.CANCER_STUDY_ID
